content: सात् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} A Taddhita affix added to a word to show that something is completely changed into the thing expressed by that word, or that it is left at the complete disposal or control of that thing; भस्मसात् भू ‘to be completely reduced to ashes’; अग्निसात्कृत्वा <ls>M. 5</ls>; भस्मसात्कृतवतः पितृद्विषः पात्रसाच्च वसुधां ससागरां <ls>R. 11. 86</ls>; विभज्य मेरुर्न यदर्थिसात्कृतः <ls>N. 1. 16</ls>; so ब्राह्मणसात्, राजसात् &c.; <ls>Śi. 14. 36.</ls>
